title: Wheel Watching
description: Created an interactive visualization using real world data by adding data-driven layers within a Mapbox canvas, adding custom SVG overlays on Mapbox maps, and adapting to the mapâ€™s panning and zooming.

title: Visualizing Grocery Insights
description: Created a clear, static visualization that highlights an insight from a dataset of grocery store food items. Had a goal of focusing on one key takeaway and explaining it effectively through design.

title: Power Outage Analysis & Prediction
description: Analyzed power outage durations across U.S. climate zones using a Purdue University research dataset. Built and trained prediction models using Scikit-learn and feature engineering. Created interactive visualizations to present key findings using Plotly and Matplotlib.

title: Loan Applications
description: Calculated disposable incomes using a sample dataset from a real financial platform. Refined a model to assess borrower risk based on disposable income trends.

title: San Diego MTS Analytics and Optimization
description: Analyzed San Diego MTS bus schedule datasets to map and visualize complex transit networks. Applied algorithms to calculate the shortest travel paths and optimize routes. Simulated and visualized the distribution of random passenger arrivals and calculated wait times.

title: Basic Image Processing App
description: Collaborated with a partner to implement a KNN classifier to predict the labels of images. Implemented image processing methods and simulated a monetized application.

title: COGS108 Project
description: Group project for COGS108 that utilizes analysis and visualization in python.

title: Hopperhacks IV Hackathon Website
description: Developed a website addressing healthcare equity by utilizing JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
